Sun, 03 Mar 2024 06:04:04 +0000 While New Zealand's imprisonment rate has dropped in recent years, the rate of those on remand has increased dramatically.
How Christchurch killer David Benbow’s texts to a journalist ended up in a High Court trial https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-christchurch-killer-david-benbows-texts-to-a-journalist-ending-up-in-a-high-court-Trial/BFNJCU5YTVB45IOKDH6BVSDEHU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-christchurch-killer-david-benbows-texts-to-a-journalist-ending-up-in-a-high-court-Trial/BFNJCU5YTVB45IOKDH6BVSDEHU/ Sam SherwoodThe series of texts that led a reporter to being a witness at a murder trial. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 06:00:00 +0000 A series of text messages from a man who called himself "Nigel" led to Sam Sherwood being called as a Crown witness in the trial of David Benbow.
